name: HELL!?
description:
A game made for Mini Game Jam 69 -Hell

To be honest I am a newbie(but I still have some PROGRAMMING EXPERIENCE) and my game inspiration is come from different YouTubers.But, i didn't copy them.So,my game might be buggy...BUT,it's fine I will definitely update and fix the bugs of the game.For me,some of the mechanic in the game is cool too.All my game assets is come from https://www.kenney.nl/assets (A Website U Can Get Free Assets~).Last Thing...Thanks itch.io to create this game jam,it's let my grow and learn more!!!

CONTROLS:

Movement -

Jump: W

LEFT: A

RIGHT: D

ATTACK -

Shoot: Space

SETTINGS -

KEYBINDS SETTINGS: ESC
